comment: What the Left does not understand is that we are not Nazis; from their point of view, we are much worse. The Nazis wanted to conquer Europe and kill people. We want to destroy Leftism and replace it with a Traditional social order, and then send away everyone who does not fit. That means -40% of our population going elsewhere. Beat that, Nazis!

We want to destroy Leftism and replace it with a Traditional social order, and then send away everyone who does not fit. That means -40% of our population going elsewhere. Beat that, Nazis!

      :snt3 (w3 / want-01
            :ARG0 (w4 / we)

                        :ARG1 l))
            :op2 (r / replace-01

                  :ARG2 (e / everyone

            :op3 (s2 / send-01
                  :ARG0 w4
                  :ARG1 e
                  :ARG1-of f
                  :polarity -))
      :ARG2 (a4 / away)
